data.title: BlackRock Marginally Reduces Stake in BAWAG Group
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

The latest update is out from BAWAG Group AG ( (DE:0B2) ).

BlackRock, Inc. has notified BAWAG Group AG that its aggregate holding of voting rights in the Austrian bank has fallen slightly, dropping below a previously reported level. As of 23 February 2026, BlackRock controls 4.98% of BAWAG’s voting rights via shares and a further 0.44% through financial instruments, for a total of 5.42%.

The move, disclosed under Austrian transparency rules, reflects a marginal reduction from BlackRock’s prior 5.52% position and signals ongoing portfolio adjustments by one of the world’s largest asset managers. While the change is modest, it is relevant for investors monitoring BAWAG’s free float structure and the influence of major institutional shareholders on the bank’s governance and market liquidity.

The most recent analyst rating on (DE:0B2) stock is a Buy with a EUR156.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on BAWAG Group AG stock, see the DE:0B2 Stock Forecast page.

More about BAWAG Group AG

BAWAG Group AG is an Austria-based banking group headquartered in Vienna and listed on the Vienna Stock Exchange. The group provides retail, corporate, and financial markets banking services, focusing on the Austrian market and select Western European countries. Its shares trade under the ISIN AT0000BAWAG2, reflecting its positioning as a listed European financial institution.

Average Trading Volume: 122,420

Current Market Cap: €10.08B

For a thorough assessment of 0B2 stock, go to TipRanks’ Stock Analysis page.

data.title: Avalon GloboCare Joins AMD AI Developer Program
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

An update from Avalon GloboCare ( (ALBT) ) is now available.

On February 26, 2026, Avalon GloboCare said it had been accepted into Advanced Micro Devices’ AI Developer Program, giving it access to AMD Developer Cloud credits, high-performance compute resources, tools, and training to support AI development. The program is expected to enhance model training efficiency, inference speed, and scalability for large language and multimodal systems used by Avalon Quantum AI, the subsidiary driving Avalon’s automated commentary video, documentation, and workflow automation platforms.

Avalon plans to use these AMD resources to scale its AI-driven media infrastructure, including automated, evidence-constrained commentary video generation, AI-assisted drafting for public company communications, and enterprise-grade compliance and workflow automation. Management framed the move as reinforcing Avalon Quantum AI’s technical capabilities and supporting the company’s ongoing strategic repositioning as a technology-focused AI player in media production and enterprise applications, potentially strengthening its competitive position in next-generation AI content and automation markets.

More about Avalon GloboCare

Avalon GloboCare Corp. is a technology-focused company developing and acquiring innovative artificial intelligence platforms, with a core emphasis on automated video generation, enterprise documentation, and workflow automation through its AI-driven subsidiary Avalon Quantum AI LLC. The company also maintains an intellectual property portfolio in cellular therapy and generative AI publishing and software, and markets the KetoAir breathalyzer, a U.S. FDA-registered Class I medical device for which it plans additional diagnostic applications.

Average Trading Volume: 281,934

Technical Sentiment Signal: Sell

Current Market Cap: $2.28M

Learn more about ALBT stock on TipRanks’ Stock Analysis page.

data.title: SuperQ Taps Institutional Veteran Bob Dameron to Scale Sovereign Quantum Infrastructure
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

Atco Mining Inc. ( (TSE:QBTQ) ) just unveiled an announcement.

SuperQ Quantum has appointed institutional veteran Bob Dameron as Senior Strategic Advisor to drive the global scaling of its sovereign hybrid-cloud infrastructure for quantum and supercomputing workloads. His background in regulated financial markets, including senior roles at the Toronto Stock Exchange and Ontario Teachers’ Group Investment Funds, is expected to help SuperQ navigate compliance, accelerate institutional adoption, and secure deployments in heavily regulated financial and government sectors.

The company said Dameron will oversee the rollout of decentralized compute nodes at Super Hubs and on-premise Super™ installations, a core element of its “Sovereign-by-Design” framework aimed at keeping mission-critical data under local jurisdiction and mitigating “harvest now, decrypt later” risks in the quantum era. Strategic objectives for 2026 include rapid infrastructure expansion across North America, Europe, and the Middle East, strengthening sovereign data security, and positioning SuperQ as a key partner for national security-sensitive and data-intensive institutions seeking quantum-speed processing without ceding control over data.

The most recent analyst rating on (TSE:QBTQ) stock is a Hold with a C$1.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Atco Mining Inc. stock, see the TSE:QBTQ Stock Forecast page.

Spark’s Take on TSE:QBTQ Stock

According to Spark, TipRanks’ AI Analyst, TSE:QBTQ is a Neutral.

The score is primarily held down by weak financial performance (no revenue, widening losses, negative free cash flow, and negative equity). Technicals are supportive but look overbought, while valuation support is limited due to a negative P/E and no dividend. Positive corporate events (product announcements and financing) provide some offset but do not overcome the current financial risk profile.

To see Spark’s full report on TSE:QBTQ stock, click here.

More about Atco Mining Inc.

SuperQ Quantum Computing Inc. is a Canadian-based leader in hybrid quantum-classical orchestration focused on reducing technical and financial barriers to quantum and supercomputing commercialization. Through its flagship Super™ platform and consumer-facing ChatQLM offering, the company targets enterprise, government, and research clients across finance, healthcare, logistics, defense, and other data-intensive sectors, while building Super Hubs in the U.S., Middle East, Asia, and other key regions.

Technical Sentiment Signal: Strong Buy

data.title: Fino Payments Bank Seeks Shareholder Nod on CEO Pay and Re-Appointment via Postal Ballot
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

The latest update is out from FINO Payments Bank Ltd. ( (IN:FINOPB) ).

Fino Payments Bank has initiated a postal ballot process to seek shareholder approval on key matters concerning its Managing Director and CEO, Rishi Gupta. The bank is asking members to approve his remuneration for the financial year 2024-25 and to confirm his re-appointment as MD and CEO for a further three-year term from May 2, 2026, to May 1, 2029.

The approvals, to be obtained via remote e-voting facilitated by NSDL, underscore the bank’s intent to ensure leadership continuity at the top. A stable management structure is likely to support Fino Payments Bank’s ongoing strategic and operational plans in the competitive payments banking space, with the voting outcome to be announced within two working days after the e-voting period closes on March 29, 2026.

More about FINO Payments Bank Ltd.

Fino Payments Bank Ltd. operates in India’s digital banking and financial services sector, focusing on payments, remittances, and basic banking services for retail customers and underbanked segments. The bank leverages technology-led distribution and partnerships to expand financial inclusion and low-cost transactional banking across the country.

Average Trading Volume: 24,174

Technical Sentiment Signal: Sell

Current Market Cap: 17.07B INR

data.title: Riverside Resources Sharpens Drill-Ready Copper Targets at Ariel Project in Sonora
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

The latest update is out from Riverside Resources ( (TSE:RRI) ).

Riverside Resources reported new early-2026 exploration results from its fully owned, drill-permitted Ariel Copper Project in Sonora, Mexico, a district-scale porphyry copper-gold target located near the La Caridad mining complex. The company highlighted that age dating shows similarities to major regional mines, reinforcing Ariel’s geological comparability to established Arizona-Sonora copper districts.

Recent fieldwork at Ariel and the adjacent Maria Luisa concessions returned high-grade silver and lead assays from veins, as well as porphyry-style alteration and mineralization, which Riverside interprets as indicators of a strong porphyry copper system. These results, combined with spectral mineral analysis, geophysical data and detailed mapping, have refined two principal target areas and positioned Ariel as a high-quality, undrilled, drill-ready copper district now actively being prepared for potential partnership and near-term drilling.

The most recent analyst rating on (TSE:RRI) stock is a Hold with a C$0.22 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Riverside Resources stock, see the TSE:RRI Stock Forecast page.

Spark’s Take on TSE:RRI Stock

According to Spark, TipRanks’ AI Analyst, TSE:RRI is a Neutral.

The score is primarily held back by weak financial performance—near-zero revenue, ongoing operating losses, and persistent negative free cash flow with worsening burn—despite a low-debt balance sheet. Technicals are mixed but lean soft (below key short-term averages with sub-50 RSI), while valuation is modestly supportive due to a low P/E but lacks dividend support.

To see Spark’s full report on TSE:RRI stock, click here.

More about Riverside Resources

Riverside Resources Inc. is a mineral exploration company focused on generating and advancing projects, with a strong emphasis on copper and precious metals in the Arizona-Sonora mining belt of Mexico. The company operates a project-generator business model, assembling and de-risking district-scale assets, such as its 100%-owned Ariel Copper Project in Sonora, to attract partners for funding and development.

Technical Sentiment Signal: Strong Buy

data.title: Mont Royal Wins Extension of Federal Funding for Ashram Road Strategy in Quebec
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

Mont Royal Resources Ltd. ( (AU:MRZ) ) has shared an update.

Mont Royal Resources’ subsidiary Commerce Resources has secured an extension of conditional approval for up to C$2.6 million in funding from Natural Resources Canada’s Critical Minerals Infrastructure Fund to advance road development studies for the Ashram Rare Earths and Fluorspar Project in Nunavik, Quebec. The revised Southern Road Access Strategy would move mixed rare earth concentrates by a 300 km road to Schefferville, then by rail to Sept-Îles and onward to the Port of Saguenay, underpinning key baseline, pre-feasibility and feasibility work while promising broader infrastructure, economic and social benefits for Nunavik’s Indigenous communities and other regional projects.

Canadian federal officials framed the support as part of a national push to build full critical minerals value chains, improve access to the Nunavik region and reinforce Canada’s status as a leading mining jurisdiction. For Mont Royal, government backing of the road and logistics corridor is positioned as critical to unlocking the Ashram deposit’s value and potentially accelerating its path to production in a strategically important segment of the global rare earths market.

The most recent analyst rating on (AU:MRZ) stock is a Sell with a A$0.18 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Mont Royal Resources Ltd. stock, see the AU:MRZ Stock Forecast page.

More about Mont Royal Resources Ltd.

Mont Royal Resources Ltd. is an Australia- and Canada-listed mining company focused on the exploration and development of critical mineral projects, notably rare earth elements and fluorspar in Quebec’s Nunavik region. Through its 100% owned subsidiary Commerce Resources, the company is advancing the Ashram Rare Earths and Fluorspar Project, targeting integration into global critical minerals supply chains.

Average Trading Volume: 379,294

Technical Sentiment Signal: Sell

Current Market Cap: A$38.5M

See more insights into MRZ stock on TipRanks’ Stock Analysis page.

data.title: AISIX Wins Three-Year Wildfire Modeling Mandate from Major Canadian Insurer
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

Minerva Intelligence ( (TSE:AISX) ) has provided an update.

AISIX Solutions Inc. has been selected as the wildfire catastrophe modeling vendor for a three-year engagement by a major Canadian insurance company, following an invite-only competitive RFP process. The insurer chose AISIX for its strong grasp of project requirements and its ability to deliver a technically aligned, tailored solution to meet the insurer’s wildfire risk objectives.

Under the engagement, AISIX will deploy its advanced wildfire catastrophe modeling and data to support underwriting, portfolio risk management, and strategic decision-making across the insurer’s operations. The contract also includes development of new features to quantify wildfire-related financial losses and reinsurance metrics, underscoring AISIX’s growing role in climate risk analytics as the parties finalize legal and due diligence steps before disclosing full contract terms.

More about Minerva Intelligence

AISIX Solutions Inc. is a Vancouver-based provider of wildfire risk assessment and data-analytics solutions serving organizations that need predictive insights into climate and wildfire-related threats. The company focuses on delivering auditable, explainable, and defensible wildfire risk models to help businesses and communities protect property, assets, and infrastructure and build resilience amid climate change.

data.title: Silver Storm Reaches 50% Plant Rehabilitation at La Parrilla Ahead of Planned Restart
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

An announcement from Silver Storm Mining ( (TSE:SVRS) ) is now available.

Silver Storm Mining reported that rehabilitation of the processing plant at its La Parrilla Silver Mine Complex in Durango, Mexico, has reached 50% completion, marking a key milestone toward a potential restart of operations in the second quarter of 2026. Work is advancing across the primary feed and crushing circuit, sulphide flotation expansion, oxide circuit, and milling area, positioning the mine for increased processing capacity and a more efficient restart that could enhance the company’s production profile and standing among Mexican silver producers.

The primary feed and crushing circuit is nearing completion with new long-lead equipment on site, while installation of eight new sulphide flotation cells is expected to lift sulphide circuit capacity from 1,000 tpd to 1,250 tpd by the end of the first quarter of 2026. Rehabilitation of leach, holding, and conditioning tanks in the oxide circuit and relining and upgrading of three ball mills are also underway, which together should support a more robust, modernized plant and may improve operational reliability and potential future cash flow once production resumes.

The most recent analyst rating on (TSE:SVRS) stock is a Hold with a C$0.69 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Silver Storm Mining stock, see the TSE:SVRS Stock Forecast page.

Spark’s Take on TSE:SVRS Stock

According to Spark, TipRanks’ AI Analyst, TSE:SVRS is a Neutral.

The score is held back primarily by weak financial performance (no revenue, widening losses, and negative operating/free cash flow), only partly offset by low leverage. Technicals are a key positive, with price above major moving averages and positive momentum indicators. Valuation remains unattractive/unclear due to a negative P/E and no dividend yield data.

To see Spark’s full report on TSE:SVRS stock, click here.

More about Silver Storm Mining

Silver Storm Mining is a Canada-listed precious metals company focused on advanced-stage silver assets in Durango, Mexico. Its portfolio includes the fully owned La Parrilla Silver Mine Complex, a past-producing operation with a 2,000 tpd mill and three underground mines, and the San Diego Project, one of Mexico’s larger undeveloped silver projects.

data.title: Consolidated Lithium Metals to Raise Up to $17.07 Million for Critical Minerals Exploration
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

An update from Consolidated Lithium Metals ( (TSE:CLM) ) is now available.

Consolidated Lithium Metals plans to raise up to $17.07 million through a non-brokered private placement of a mix of listed issuer financing units, flow-through shares and charity flow-through units, each with associated common shares and warrants. The securities will be offered under Canadian prospectus exemptions, with portions free of resale restrictions and others subject to a statutory hold period, and may involve finder’s fees and finder warrants tied to the various offering components.

The proceeds are earmarked primarily for exploration and critical mineral mining expenditures at the Kwyjibo Rare Earth Project, further work on the company’s lithium properties, and general working capital and corporate purposes. The financing is expected to strengthen CLM’s balance sheet and support its strategy of advancing critical mineral assets, potentially enhancing its position in the growing market for lithium and rare earth elements while diluting existing shareholders through new equity issuance.

More about Consolidated Lithium Metals

Consolidated Lithium Metals Inc. is a Canadian mineral exploration company focused on lithium and rare earth elements, with projects including the Kwyjibo Rare Earth Project and various lithium properties. The company is listed on the TSX Venture Exchange, the Frankfurt Stock Exchange and the OTCQB, positioning it to tap both domestic and international capital markets for critical minerals development.

Average Trading Volume: 490,276

Technical Sentiment Signal: Buy

Current Market Cap: C$41.01M
